video.title: Private Practice
video.synopsis: At Oceanside Wellness Center, Dr. Addison Montgomery deals with competing personalities in the new world of holistic medicine.

episodes.synopsis: Addison heads to Los Angeles for a new job, though her new co-workers are not expecting her; her first case at the wellness center could make or break her reputation with the staff.
episodes.title: In Which We Meet Addison, a Nice Girl From Somewhere Else

episodes.synopsis: Cooper hires someone to help Sam jump-start his new life as a single person; the doctors work with St. Ambrose Hospital's chief of staff to determine the cause of a baby's illness.
episodes.title: In Which Sam Receives an Unexpected Visitor

episodes.synopsis: Addison needs Pete's assistance in treating a newlywed couple with difficulty consummating the nuptials; Violet urges a patient to leave his wife; Cooper tries to figure out why four sisters have a mysterious illness.
episodes.title: In Which Addison Finds the Magic

episodes.synopsis: Addison invites her co-workers to a gathering, but no one responds; the wife of Violet's former boyfriend visits the clinic for treatment; Cooper counsels a lovesick young patient; Sam appears on a morning show to promote his book.
episodes.title: In Which Addison Has a Very Casual Get Together

episodes.synopsis: Addison cannot stop thinking of Pete; Violet's ex visits the clinic and Cooper is not happy to see him; Naomi and Sam's daughter secretly seeks Addison's medical advice.
episodes.title: In Which Addison Finds a Showerhead

episodes.synopsis: Charlotte asks Pete to treat her insomnia; Naomi has her first date since college; a patient wants Addison and Naomi to keep information about her fertility from her husband.
episodes.title: In Which Charlotte Goes Down the Rabbit Hole

episodes.synopsis: Sam finds himself in the midst of a dangerous house call; Pete and Addison decide to take their relationship to the next level; Violet enters a friends-with-benefits pact with Cooper.
episodes.title: In Which Sam Gets Taken for a Ride

episodes.synopsis: Cooper gets surprising results with online dating; Addison has a date with one of Violet's patients; Naomi and Sam make a house call at a convent; Addison and Pete help a teenage mother as part of a Safe Surrender program.
episodes.title: In Which Cooper Finds a Port in His Storm

episodes.synopsis: To Charlotte's displeasure, the center starts a class for fathers-to-be; Sam and Naomi struggle to figure where their relationship is going; Addison's status in the dating world makes her uneasy; Cooper begins a secret affair.
episodes.title: In Which Dell Finds His Fight

episodes.synopsis: Addison discovers that Naomi is concealing the practice's financial problems. Meanwhile, Violet wonders what secret Cooper is keeping from her.
episodes.title: A Family Thing

episodes.synopsis: Addison and Sam form a hostile takeover in order to bring the practice out of bankruptcy, while Violet's friendship with Cooper is on the brink of extinction.
episodes.title: Equal And Opposite

episodes.synopsis: Addison and Kevin's relationship heats up, as Violet is threatened by a patient's son. Meanwhile, Sam questions his ability to save Oceanside Wellness.
episodes.title: Nothing to Talk About

episodes.synopsis: An office election pits Sam and Naomi against each other to lead the practice, and Cooper's personal life catches up with his professional one.
episodes.title: Past Tense

episodes.synopsis: Violet must choose whether or not to break the law for a friend, while Addison's choices as leader of the practice may place Oceanside in peril.
episodes.title: Let It Go

episodes.synopsis: Addison treats two pregnant women who unknowingly share the same husband.
episodes.title: Serving Two Masters

episodes.synopsis: Addison's brother, Archer, makes a surprise visit, stirring up trouble for his big sis and Oceanside Wellness Group.
episodes.title: Tempting Faith

episodes.synopsis: Addison fights to save the lives of a pregnant woman in a coma and her unborn child.
episodes.title: Crime and Punishment

episodes.synopsis: Charlotte's rival practice opens its doors, forcing the doctors of Oceanside Wellness to compete for clients.
episodes.title: Know When to Fold

episodes.synopsis: Pete's girlfriend makes a surprise visit to LA the day after he and Violet have slept together.
episodes.title: Worlds Apart

episodes.synopsis: A measles outbreak forces Oceanside into quarantine lockdown, while Naomi pressures Addison into helping her Pacific Wellcare rival, Wyatt, on a case.
episodes.title: Contamination

episodes.synopsis: Addison is attracted to Wyatt, the rival practice's brash doctor, while Violet secretly dates Pete and Sheldon at the same time.
episodes.title: Homeward Bound

episodes.synopsis: Violet discovers she's pregnant, but doesn't know who the father is.
episodes.title: Nothing to Fear

episodes.synopsis: Addison's brother moves to LA and begins working at the rival practice, and Violet avoids discussing her pregnancy with the potential fathers.
episodes.title: Second Chances

episodes.synopsis: When Archer suffers a severe seizure, Addison uses every possible resource to find the cause and a cure, inlcuding turning to her ex-husband Derek.
episodes.title: Acceptance

episodes.synopsis: Addison teams with Derek to save the life of his pregnant patient, as Naomi and Bailey treat Sam after a sudden asthma attack.
episodes.title: Ex-Life

episodes.synopsis: Archer and Naomi grow romantically closer, while Addison suspects her brother is up to his old tricks.
episodes.title: Wait and See

episodes.synopsis: Addison flirts with a new love interest who turns out to be more than she bargained for.
episodes.title: Finishing

episodes.synopsis: Violet must convince a pregnant psych patient to undergo an unwanted surgery that will save her life.
episodes.title: What Women Want

episodes.synopsis: Pete begins dating a single mother and causes Violet to rethink her feelings for him.
episodes.title: Do the Right Thing

episodes.synopsis: Addison and Noah are brought together to save a pregnant heart patient, while Naomi's secrets drive her and Sam further apart.
episodes.title: What You Do for Love

episodes.synopsis: As Violet chooses between Pete and Sheldon, a grief-stricken patient poses a danger to her; Addison faces her feelings for Noah as Morgan goes into labor.
episodes.title: Yours, Mine and Ours

episodes.synopsis: Addison and Naomi fight to save Violet's life after a violent attack leaves her severely injured and her baby missing.
episodes.title: A Death in the Family

episodes.synopsis: Violet's emotional trauma from her violent attack at home is not going away, despite her friends' best efforts to help; Addison and Naomi try to mend their tension-filled relationship; Sam and Cooper treat a man who was stabbed by his wife.
episodes.title: The Way We Were

episodes.synopsis: Addison isn't the only Oceanside Wellness doctor pleased to see Miranda Bailey when she brings a patient to Los Angeles; the consequences of Addison's affair with Noah catch up with her; Sheldon and Pete discover who is the father of Violet's baby.
episodes.title: Right Here, Right Now

episodes.synopsis: Sam, Cooper and Addison treat a homeless teen mother's child; Violet's feelings about her attack resurface while counseling a pregnant rape victim; Cooper's financial issues catch up with him.
episodes.title: Pushing the Limits

episodes.synopsis: A serious complication threatens the fetuses of two of Naomi's former patients; Violet is asked to testify against her attacker; Charlotte tries to join the Oceanside Wellness Group.
episodes.title: Strange Bedfellows

episodes.synopsis: Naomi struggles with the idea of genetically designing babies; Violet suddenly decides to try electric shock therapy on a patient.
episodes.title: Slip Slidin' Away

episodes.synopsis: Addison and Sam perform urgent field care when, while out hiking, they stumble across a couple trapped in their car after an accident.
episodes.title: The Hard Part

episodes.synopsis: Addison is shaken by her father's arrival in Los Angeles; After he refuses to cooperate in a case involving a longtime patient, Cooper is arrested; Pete fights to keep a terminally ill patient alive long enough for him to meet his new daughter.
episodes.title: Sins of the Father

episodes.synopsis: Addison must perform a complex in-utero surgery; Naomi and Sam discover their daughter is growing up too fast.
episodes.title: The Parent Trap

episodes.synopsis: An explosion at Dell's house sends Heather and Betsey to the hospital; a shocking family secret is revealed when Addison's mother visits.
episodes.title: Blowups

episodes.synopsis: Mark follows Addison to Oceanside Wellness in hope of helping his daughter; Naomi and Dell try to raise their children under the same roof; Cooper and Violet don't agree on how to treat a patient.
episodes.title: Another Second Chance

episodes.synopsis: Maya's announcement shocks Sam and Naomi; Pete challenges Fife on a patient with a cutting-edge bionic arm.
episodes.title: Best Laid Plans

episodes.synopsis: Addison's patients must choose which one of their sickly daughters to save with their newborn's core blood; Sam discovers that Dink intends to marry Maya.
episodes.title: Shotgun

episodes.synopsis: Naomi refuses to take part in planning Maya's wedding; tensions rise between Sam and Addison; Pete and Cooper treat a teenager with a mysterious bite mark.
episodes.title: Love Bites

episodes.synopsis: Naomi, Addison and Pete try to save a premature baby; Cooper thinks Charlotte's new boyfriend is abusing pills.
episodes.title: 'Til Death Do Us Part

episodes.synopsis: Addison, Pete and Sam must work together on a complicated case involving a father-to-be who comes down with tuberculosis; Sheldon's helps one of Violet's patients get over her fear of flying.
episodes.title: Fear of Flying

episodes.synopsis: When the lives of Addison's patient and her three unborn babies hang in the balance, Sam's new girlfriend and Addison are divided on the course of the treatment.
episodes.title: Triangles

episodes.synopsis: The hospital must keep a surrogate mother on life support until her fetuses are able to survive; Naomi discovers that Addison and Sam have feelings for each other.
episodes.title: Pulling the Plug

episodes.synopsis: When a famed neurosurgeon and her team visit St. Ambrose, Addison is surprised to see Derek's younger sister on the team; Charlotte and Cooper try to figure out how to work together.
episodes.title: Eyes Wide Open

episodes.synopsis: After her escape to Costa Rica, Violet returns home and to the practice; Amelia interferes in Sam's personal life; Sheldon encourages Charlotte to reconcile with Cooper.
episodes.title: Second Choices

episodes.synopsis: When Violet files for joint custody of Lucas, Pete fights back, forcing friends and co-workers to choose sides.
episodes.title: War

episodes.synopsis: Naomi puts Fife in a conflicted position when she begs him to help William's advanced ALS with his still experimental treatment.
episodes.title: In the Name of Love

episodes.synopsis: Addison, Amelia and Fife try to save Maya and her unborn child. Sam makes a grim discovery, and an unexpected death leaves everyone stunned.
episodes.title: The End of a Beautiful Friendship

episodes.synopsis: Pete and Violet prepare for their wedding day; things take a surprising turn with Addison and Sam; despite disagreements, the doctors come together to mourn the loss of Dell.
episodes.title: Take Two

episodes.synopsis: Violet and Cooper make changes to their friendship to appease their significant others; Pete and Cooper argue over a patient's marijuana use; Addison debates going public with her new romance.
episodes.title: Short Cuts

episodes.synopsis: The man responsible for killing Dell and endangering Maya's life comes to the clinic with a heart condition; news of Addison's new romance is not well-received.
episodes.title: Playing God

episodes.synopsis: Emotions are stirred up at the practice when Dell's daughter arrives; a pregnant woman experiences chronic pain.
episodes.title: A Better Place to Be

episodes.synopsis: Addison butts heads with a new oncologist (Cristian de la Fuente) while treating a newborn with a malignant tumor; Pete is uncomfortable when Violet tries to help a parolee.
episodes.title: In or Out

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Addison disagree over the treatment of a comatose patient who becomes pregnant; Charlotte and Pete face an ethical dilemma when a patient with HIV is in a serious car accident.
episodes.title: All in the Family

episodes.synopsis: Pete finds Charlotte bloodied and bruised in the halls of the hospital, but only Addison learns the full extent of her injuries.
episodes.title: Did You Hear What Happened to Charlotte King?

episodes.synopsis: Charlotte suffers in silence after the assault while Addison tries to keep the events of that night a secret; Cooper and the doctors of Oceanside Wellness have trouble coping after the attack.
episodes.title: What Happens Next

episodes.synopsis: Charlotte's colleagues think they know what is best as she deals with the aftermath of her assault; Pete's estranged brother visits unexpectedly to ask him for help.
episodes.title: Can't Find My Way Back Home

episodes.synopsis: Cooper gets bad news about Charlotte's sexual assault case; a case involving a pregnant drug addict hits Addison hard.
episodes.title: Just Lose It

episodes.synopsis: Addison's mother demands she do whatever it takes to keep her partner alive; a medical consultation becomes complicated for Amelia and Pete; Charlotte and Cooper give intimacy another try; Violet considers publishing a revealing book.
episodes.title: If You Don't Know Me by Now

episodes.synopsis: Addison tries to keep her distance from flirtatious Dr. Rodriguez; Sam worries about the care a patient is receiving; Sheldon refers Charlotte to a friend for psychiatric help.
episodes.title: Heaven Can Wait

episodes.synopsis: Charlotte's attacker (Nicholas Brendon) arrives at the hospital in need of urgent care; Bizzy begs Addison for help when Susan's health deteriorates.
episodes.title: Blind Love

episodes.synopsis: When Addison goes home to Connecticut to deal with a family tragedy, Sam and her friends decide to tag along; Sheldon and Violet fight over a death row patient's confession.
episodes.title: Home Again

episodes.synopsis: Cooper and Charlotte try to forgive each other after revealing secrets in couples therapy.
episodes.title: Two Steps Back

episodes.synopsis: A woman and her husband want to harvest their unborn baby's eggs.
episodes.title: Love and Lies

episodes.synopsis: Sheldon falls for the critic who panned Violet's book; a patient is caught in a love triangle with her brother-in-law and sister; Cooper and Sam try to convince a family to put a boy's health above his wrestling career.
episodes.title: A Step Too Far

episodes.synopsis: Pete's brother brings their mother in for a consultation; Violet catches Sheldon asking her archenemy for a date.
episodes.title: The Hardest Part

episodes.synopsis: Katie threatens legal action against Violet; Cooper suspects Charlotte still has feelings for her ex-husband.
episodes.title: What We Have Here..

episodes.synopsis: Cooper and Charlotte second-guess their wedding plans; an investigator visits the practice to question the doctors about Violet's case.
episodes.title: Something Old, Something New

episodes.synopsis: The doctors launch an investigation after Betsey's second emergency room visit; Naomi makes a life-changing decision.
episodes.title: God Bless the Child

episodes.synopsis: The doctors face a tough decision regarding the future of Oceanside Wellness; a new admirer offers Addison a tempting proposition.
episodes.title: ...To Change the Things I Can

episodes.synopsis: Cooper, Sam, Amelia and Charlotte try to save Pete's life after his heart attack; Addison's desire to have a child leads to a surprising encounter.
episodes.title: God Laughs

episodes.synopsis: While interviewing potential replacements for Naomi, the doctors at Oceanside Wellness don't understand Addison's resistance to hiring Jake Reilly.
episodes.title: Breaking the Rules

episodes.synopsis: A woman without a uterus asks Jake and Addison to help her have a baby; Amelia treats a woman with Parkinson's disease who is habitually unfaithful.
episodes.title: Deal with It

episodes.synopsis: A woman from Cooper's past visits the practice; a pregnant woman experiences severe memory loss after a car accident; Violet and Sheldon argue.
episodes.title: Remember Me

episodes.synopsis: Addison begins treatments for in-vitro fertilization; a sick friend asks Amelia to help her commit suicide; Sam and Violet face a patient who refuses to take his medication.
episodes.title: Step One

episodes.synopsis: Charlotte faces painful memories of a horrible tragedy; Amelia continues to spin out of control; Addison takes a step closer to motherhood.
episodes.title: If I Hadn't Forgotten...

episodes.synopsis: Amelia's drug addiction accelerates as she begins writing herself prescriptions and skipping work; Jake and Addison face an impossible choice; Violet returns to work.
episodes.title: Don't Stop `Till You Get Enough

episodes.synopsis: The doctors stage an intervention for Amelia after she returns from a 12-day drug binge with her boyfriend.
episodes.title: Who We Are

episodes.synopsis: Amelia bonds with an 18-year-old woman as they endure painful drug detox in rehab; a patient in need tests Cooper's bond with his son.
episodes.title: The Breaking Point

episodes.synopsis: Cooper must decide whether or not to punish Mason after he is caught stealing; Pete and Violet struggle to split time with Lucas; Addison prepares for a new baby.
episodes.title: Are You My Mother?

episodes.synopsis: Pete, Violet, Sam and Addison adjust to their new lives; Addison second-guesses her desire for a baby; Violet thinks about dating a paramedic.
episodes.title: The Standing Eight Count

episodes.synopsis: Cooper, Charlotte and Amelia counsel Erica on a tough decision; Addison and Jake meet with potential surrogates.
episodes.title: Losing Battles

episodes.synopsis: Cooper and Charlotte are forced to deal with their future when Erica and Mason get in an accident; Addison and Jake go to a medical conference.
episodes.title: The Time Has Come

episodes.synopsis: Sam finds his estranged sister in jail, heavily medicated and in a nearly catatonic state; Erica begins secret cancer treatments.
episodes.title: Too Much

episodes.synopsis: Charlotte and Cooper bring Erica to Seattle Grace to speak with Amelia, Derek and Lexie about a risky surgery.
episodes.title: You Break My Heart

episodes.synopsis: Sam struggles to take care of his sister; Sheldon finds out that Amelia has life-altering news; Addison and Jake continue to flirt.
episodes.title: Andromeda

episodes.synopsis: Sam struggles to take care of his sister; Sheldon finds out that Amelia has life-altering news; Addison and Jake continue to flirt.
episodes.title: The Letting Go

episodes.synopsis: Charlotte and Cooper try to help Mason come to terms with Erica's rapidly deteriorating condition; Pete and Violet discover they still have feelings for each other.
episodes.title: It Was Inevitable

episodes.synopsis: Pete and Violet go to a marriage counselor; Amelia gets some devistating news; Mason refuses to speak to Charlotte and Cooper.
episodes.title: And Then There Was One

episodes.synopsis: An illegal immigrant facing deportation tries to induce her pregnancy by herself so her child will be a U.S. citizen; Violet wants to keep going to therapy with Pete.
episodes.title: True Colors

episodes.synopsis: When a patient's father and partner can't agree on his health care, Pete makes a decision; Jake suspects Amelia is being tempted to substance abuse.
episodes.title: Drifting Back

episodes.synopsis: The Seaside doctors go to Amelia's side as she begins labor; Pete and Violet realize how they feel about each other; Addison must make a decision.
episodes.title: Gone, Baby, Gone

episodes.synopsis: Addison enjoys her burgeoning romance; Violet is worried when Pete doesn't show up to his preliminary court hearing; Charlotte shares a secret with Cooper; Sheldon and his ex-wife rekindle their romance.
episodes.title: Aftershock

episodes.synopsis: The doctors reminisce during a celebration at Addison's house; Sheldon counsels a suicidal patient who makes a shocking confession.
episodes.title: Mourning Sickness

episodes.synopsis: Violet looks to Sheldon for advice after a patient makes a chilling confession; Addison tries to hide her grief; Cooper and Charlotte adjust to their new life; Sam confronts Sheldon.
episodes.title: Good Grief

episodes.synopsis: A little girl disappears from the ER; Addison and Jake butt heads over one of his patients; a new doctor starts at Saint Ambrose; Stephanie asks Sam about Addison.
episodes.title: You Don't Know What You've Got Till It's Gone

episodes.synopsis: A reality show focused on Sam sheds light on issues in his colleagues' personal lives; Sam's mother asks him for help; the search for the missing girl continues.
episodes.title: The Next Episode

episodes.synopsis: Addison's role as a parent is challenged when Henry's biological mother asks to be involved in his life; Addison's mentor shares a difficult secret.
episodes.title: Apron Strings

episodes.synopsis: When Jake learns he will have to meet Henry's social worker, he worries about an incident from his past; Addison is suspicious of Jake's patient; James pursues Amelia.
episodes.title: The World According to Jake

episodes.synopsis: A fight between Charlotte and Cooper leads to trouble with the triplets; Violet consoles a friend who is being advised to take a loved one off life support.
episodes.title: Life Support

episodes.synopsis: As a new woman brings Sheldon happiness, he also becomes more suspicious about a patient's involvement in Sarah's disappearance.
episodes.title: I'm Fine

episodes.synopsis: Charlotte continues to run the hospital from her bed; Mason starts acting out in school.
episodes.title: Georgia on my Mind

episodes.synopsis: The doctors at the practice set Amelia up on a series of blind dates that all end up being disastrous; Amelia and James team up for a medical procedure.
episodes.title: Good Fries are Hard to Come By

episodes.synopsis: At Henry's court date, Addison realizes the judge has concerns about Jake's past; Sheldon wants Miranda to meet his friends; Charlotte goes into labor.
episodes.title: Full Release

episodes.synopsis: Naomi returns for Addison's wedding day; Cooper struggles in his role as a stay-at-home father; Violet starts a new project that has special meaning.
episodes.title: In Which We Say Goodbye
